mapper.select: select sjm.stdno, sjm.memno, sjm.rdt, sjm.grade, m.mname, m.email from study_joined_member sjm left join member m on sjm.memno=m.memno where sjm.stdno=#{studyNo} and grade=1
SELECT * from study_joined_member jm inner join study_info si on jm.stdno = si.stdno left outer join study_review sr on si.stdno = sr.stdno and jm.memno = sr.memno where jm.memno = #{value}
select sjm.stdno, sjm.memno, sjm.rdt, sjm.grade, m.mname, m.email, m.pfp from study_joined_member sjm left join member m on sjm.memno=m.memno where sjm.stdno=#{studyNo} and grade != 2
select count(*) as cnt from study_joined_member where stdno=#{studyNo} and grade != 2
select j.stdno, j.memno, j.grade, m.mname, m.pfp from study_joined_member j left join member m on j.memno=m.memno where j.stdno=#{studyNo} and grade=0

SELECT mi.memno, mi.itr, si.stdno, si.sname, si.pic, si.ctgr, si.county FROM member_interest mi LEFT JOIN study_info si ON mi.itr=si.ctgr WHERE si.stdno=1 OR si.stdno=109 OR si.stdno=15 GROUP BY si.stdno
